author: DEMOS, Desarrollo de Medios, S.A. de C.V.
title: La Jornada: El descenso de las religiones
text:
El descenso de las religiones Gabriela RodrÃ­guez E l porcentaje de religiosos en el planeta ha venido decreciendo, especialmente de catÃ³licos y cristianos. Al mismo tiempo, crecen rÃ¡pidamente quienes no se identifican con ninguna religiÃ³n. TambiÃ©n desciende la atenciÃ³n a servicios religiosos, la frecuencia de rezar y la importancia de la religiÃ³n en sus vidas, fenÃ³meno conceptualizado como secularizaciÃ³n. Europa occidental es menos religiosa que Estados Unidos, aunque el porcentaje de cristianos en el Ãºltimo paÃ­s pasÃ³ de 78 a 63 en 15 aÃ±os y de personas sin religiÃ³n creciÃ³ de 16 a 29 por ciento (de 2007 a 2022). Los paÃ­ses donde va tomando menor importancia la religiÃ³n son EspaÃ±a, CanadÃ¡, Australia, Holanda, EU, Gran BretaÃ±a e Italia, entre otros; con un descenso medio de importancia a lo religioso se registran en TÃºnez, Francia, SudÂ­corea, HungrÃ­a, MÃ©xico, SudÃ¡frica y Argentina; y a menor velocidad descienden quienes se adscriben como judÃ­os, islÃ¡micos, hinduistas y budistas. En contraste, opinan que el papel de la religiÃ³n en sus sociedades se estÃ¡ incrementando en Indonesia, Nigeria, Kenia, Filipinas, India y Brasil.
Cerca de 85 por ciento de la poblaciÃ³n mundial se identifica con alguna religiÃ³n; 15 por ciento no se adscribe a ninguna. Las religiones mÃ¡s populares son las cristianas â€“2 mil 38 millones (incluye catÃ³lica, protestante y ortodoxa)â€“, la musulmana (mÃ¡s de mil 900 millones, y es muy probable que Ã©sta alcance al cristianismo en 2050), hinduismo (mÃ¡s de mil 600 millones). El mayor nivel econÃ³mico se correlaciona positivamente con el menor involucramiento religioso y con el descenso de las tasas de fecundidad, en las regiones altamente religiosas la poblaciÃ³n sigue creciendo. En Ãfrica y Medio Oriente las mujeres tienen mÃ¡s hijos que en Europa, AmÃ©rica o Asia Oriental. Ãfrica Subsahariana es la regiÃ³n con el mÃ¡s rÃ¡pido crecimiento poblacional y donde crecen mÃ¡s cristianos y musulmanes; Ã©stos a mayor velocidad. No se cuenta con datos confiables de la religiosidad en China, pero su polÃ­tica de un solo hijo fue excepcional y redujo drÃ¡sticamente la fecundidad ( Key Findings From the Global Religious Futures Project , Pew Reserch, 2022, World Population Review, 2023).
El panorama religioso de MÃ©xico ha cambiado mucho en el Ãºltimo siglo. Mientras en el censo de 1895 menos de uno por ciento de la poblaciÃ³n tenÃ­a una religiÃ³n distinta a la catÃ³lica, hoy 14.3 millones profesan una religiÃ³n distinta a la mayoritaria y 13.3 millones se declaran sin religiÃ³n o sin adscripciÃ³n religiosa (ambos grupos suman 21.9 por ciento de la poblaciÃ³n). El aumento de personas sin religiÃ³n casi se duplicÃ³ en los Ãºltimos 10 aÃ±os: pasÃ³ de 4.7 a 8.1 por ciento (son mÃ¡s de 10 millones), 2.5 por ciento se identifican como creyentes sin adscripciÃ³n religiosa (mÃ¡s de 3 millones). El descenso de catÃ³licos fue de 5 puntos; pasÃ³ de 82.7 a 77 por ciento, y aumentaron los protestantes, cristianos y evangÃ©licos, de 7.5 a 11.2 por ciento; se adscriben como judaicas 58 mil 876 personas; a religiones con raÃ­ces afro, 40 mil 799; con raÃ­ces Ã©tnicas, 33 mil 372; 36 mil 764 espiritualistas, y 7 mil 982 islÃ¡micos. Las variaciones por edad son interesantes, en el rango de 25 a 29 aÃ±os estÃ¡ el mayor porcentaje de quienes no profesan religiÃ³n (5.9 por ciento de los hombres y 4.5 por ciento de las mujeres), en todos los credos las mujeres son mÃ¡s religiosas que los hombres. En siete entidades se concentra mÃ¡s de la mitad de la poblaciÃ³n Â­mexicana sin religiÃ³n: estado de MeÌxico, Ciudad de MeÌxico, Baja California, Chiapas, Veracruz, Nuevo LeoÌn y Chihuahua. En la Ciudad de MÃ©xico no tienen ninguna religiÃ³n 11.9 por ciento de jÃ³venes de 25 a 29 aÃ±os (6.6 por ciento de hombres y 5.3 de mujeres), ni adscripciÃ³n religiosa 8.6 de este grupo de edad; es, ademÃ¡s, la entidad con la menor tasa global de fecundidad (1.4 hijos por mujer) y con la menor tasa de fecundidad de adolescentes: 45.3 nacimientos por cada mil adolescentes (Inegi, censos 2010 y 2020/ Conapo, ConciliaciÃ³n demogrÃ¡fica y proyecciones de poblaciÃ³n 2020-2050).
Aunque la religiosidad va descendiendo y crece la diversidad y la no adscripciÃ³n religiosa, estos dÃ­as los sÃ­mbolos navideÃ±os rodean los entornos en los paÃ­ses de la regiÃ³n occidental, puesto que es cristiana una tercera parte de la poblaciÃ³n mundial, y porque ha sido una estrategia para aumentar el Â­consumo.
EscribiÃ³ Ã‰mile Durkheim que â€œla educaciÃ³n es la influencia que ejercen las generaciones adultas sobre niÃ±os y jÃ³venes [â€¦] acto de imposiciÃ³n inevitable, pero necesario, pues sÃ³lo asÃ­ es posible construir un nuevo ser, el ser social [â€¦] el Estado debe ser garante y responsable de la nueva educaciÃ³n que tendrÃ­a que ser de un laicismo irrenunciableâ€ ( EducaciÃ³n y sociologÃ­a , Ed. PenÃ­nsula, Barcelona, 1990). Celebro que la educaciÃ³n laica sea en MÃ©xico un derecho constitucional de niÃ±os y adolescentes desde 1917, y que el nuevo libro de texto de sexto grado de primaria, incluya ejercicios para respetar la igualdad de trato a todas las religiones y a promover la libertad de culto.
* Secretaria general del Conapo

author: Diario Deportivo OlÃ©
title: March Madness: los requisitos para entrar al Bracket Challenge y poder ganar una verdadera fortuna
text:
En pleno auge del March Madness, llega una de las competencias mÃ¡s emocionantes para los fanÃ¡ticos del baloncesto universitario: el Bracket Challenge. Los requisitos para participar son simples, pero la recompensa puede ser una verdadera fortuna si logras acertar en cada una de las selecciones.
Miles de personas en los Estados Unidos continÃºan sumÃ¡ndose a este desafÃ­o, donde las apuestas y la emociÃ³n crecen a medida que avanza el torneo. Aunque completar el bracket perfecto parece una tarea casi imposible, los premios por lograrlo son impresionantes, y las oportunidades de convertirse en millonario son reales.
March Madness: Â¿CuÃ¡les son los requisitos y cÃ³mo anotarse para participar del Bracket Challenge?
El Bracket Challenge del March Madness estÃ¡ abierto exclusivamente para residentes legales de los 50 estados de EE.UU. y el Distrito de Columbia, que sean mayores de 18 aÃ±os. Las personas que trabajen para Warner Bros. Discovery, CBS, NCAA, teamDigital, o sus afiliadas, asÃ­ como sus familias o compaÃ±eros de trabajo, no podrÃ¡n participar en este desafÃ­o para evitar sospechas de corrupciÃ³n.
Las inscripciones al Bracket Challenge comenzaron el domingo 16 de marzo a las 6:00 p.m. ET, cuando se anunciaron los equipos del torneo. Desde ese momento, los participantes empezaron a elegir sus selecciones y preparar sus brackets. La posibilidad de anotarse se extenderÃ¡ hasta el jueves 20 de marzo a las 12 p.m. ET, cuando los brackets se bloquean y ya no se podrÃ¡n realizar modificaciones.
Es fundamental tener en cuenta estas fechas para participar en el desafÃ­o y aprovechar la oportunidad de ganar una verdadera fortuna. A continuaciÃ³n, te explicamos paso a paso cÃ³mo inscribirte en el Bracket Challenge:
- Accede a la pestaÃ±a "Mis selecciones" en la pÃ¡gina oficial del Bracket Challenge.
- Inicia sesiÃ³n o regÃ­strate si aÃºn no lo has hecho.
- Haz clic en el DesafÃ­o del cuadro masculino para comenzar a hacer tus selecciones.
- Puedes crear hasta diez brackets para competir en el desafÃ­o.
- Invita a tus amigos a unirse a tu grupo y compite por el derecho a presumir.
- DespuÃ©s del cierre de la inscripciÃ³n, el jueves 20 de marzo al mediodÃ­a ET, los brackets no podrÃ¡n ser modificados.
- Sigue el progreso de tus selecciones desde tu telÃ©fono, tableta o computadora.
Probabilidades de ganar y el premio del Bracket Challenge
El Bracket Challenge atrae a millones de participantes cada aÃ±o, pero las probabilidades de acertar en todos los partidos del torneo son extremadamente bajas. A pesar de que el 94% de los brackets son Ãºnicos, las combinaciones posibles para uno perfecto cubren solo una fracciÃ³n mÃ­nima de todas las permutaciones posibles.
El premio para el ganador, en tanto, incluye un viaje de 4 noches a la Final Four 2026 en IndianÃ¡polis. Este paquete incluye:
- Dos entradas para los juegos de semifinales y final.
- 4 noches de alojamiento en un hotel elegido por el patrocinador.
- USD 1,500 para pasajes aÃ©reos.
- USD 750 en efectivo.

author: La rÃ©daction avec AFP
title: Religion. Â« Situation prÃ©occupante Â» pour le pape FranÃ§ois, toujours dans un Ã©tat critique
text:
Religion Â« Situation prÃ©occupante Â» pour le pape FranÃ§ois, toujours dans un Ã©tat critique
Le pape FranÃ§ois, hospitalisÃ© pour une pneumonie et dont l'Ã©tat de santÃ© Ã©tait Â« critique Â» samedi soir, Â« a passÃ© une nuit tranquille Â», a annoncÃ© dimanche le Vatican.
AprÃ¨s plusieurs jours d'accalmie, l'Ã©tat de santÃ© du pape FranÃ§ois s'est dÃ©gradÃ© ces derniÃ¨res 24 heures. Le pontife argentin de 88 ans, pour lequel le diagnostic des mÃ©decins Ã©tait Â« rÃ©servÃ© Â» samedi soir, a toutefois Â« passÃ© une nuit tranquille et s'est reposÃ© Â» Ã  l'hÃ´pital Gemelli de Rome, a annoncÃ© le Vatican sur sa chaÃ®ne Telegram.
Le chef de l'Ã‰glise catholique est hospitalisÃ© depuis le 14 fÃ©vrier pour une pneumonie des deux poumons et son Ã©tat s'est dÃ©gradÃ© samedi avec Â« une crise asthmatique prolongÃ©e qui a nÃ©cessitÃ© l'application d'oxygÃ¨ne Ã  haut dÃ©bit Â», selon le dernier bulletin de santÃ©. Â« Les analyses de sang effectuÃ©es aujourd'hui ont Ã©galement rÃ©vÃ©lÃ© une thrombopÃ©nie (baisse du nombre de plaquettes sanguines), associÃ©e Ã  une anÃ©mie, qui a nÃ©cessitÃ© l'administration d'une transfusion sanguine.
Prochains jours Â« dÃ©terminants Â»
Le Saint-PÃ¨re reste alerte et a passÃ© la journÃ©e dans un fauteuil, bien qu'il souffre davantage qu'hier. Le pronostic est actuellement rÃ©servÃ© Â», a prÃ©cisÃ© le Vatican dans ce communiquÃ© au ton d'une rare gravitÃ©. DÃ¨s vendredi aprÃ¨s-midi les mÃ©decins qui s'occupent du pape avaient mis en garde sur la fragilitÃ© de la situation. Â« Le pape est-il hors de danger ? Non, le pape n'est pas hors de danger Â», avait affirmÃ© le Pr Sergio Alfieri lors d'une confÃ©rence de presse Ã  l'hÃ´pital Gemelli. Â« Le vrai risque dans ces cas-lÃ  est que les germes passent dans le sang Â», provoquant ainsi une septicÃ©mie potentiellement mortelle, avait-il expliquÃ©.
Â« La situation est devenue plus prÃ©occupante Â», a dÃ©clarÃ© le virologue Fabrizio Pregliasco, citÃ© dimanche par le quotidien La Stampa. Â« L'Ã¢ge du Saint PÃ¨re, ainsi que les antÃ©cÃ©dents de santÃ©, comme par exemple la bronchite asthmatique, pourraient avoir compliquÃ© les choses et pas qu'un peu Â», dÃ©taille-t-il. Â« Il faut espÃ©rer que la thÃ©rapie antibiotique fonctionne pour Ã©viter le risque d'une septicÃ©mie, une infection systÃ©mique, qui peut avoir une issue fatale. Le pape est certainement en de bonnes mains mais les prochaines heures et les prochains jours seront dÃ©terminants Â», estime l'expert.
PriÃ¨res Ã  travers le monde
Il sera hospitalisÃ© au moins toute la semaine prochaine et il ne dirigera pas dimanche, pour la deuxiÃ¨me fois d'affilÃ©e, la priÃ¨re de l'AngÃ©lus. En dÃ©but de matinÃ©e, une messe se tiendra au Vatican lors de laquelle le pro-prÃ©fet du dicastÃ¨re pour l'Ã‰vangÃ©lisation lira l'homÃ©lie prÃ©parÃ©e par le pape. Plusieurs responsables religieux et politiques ont dit prier pour le pape. Depuis samedi soir sur les rÃ©seaux sociaux, les internautes ont aussi postÃ© des centaines de messages disant prier pour FranÃ§ois, beaucoup postant une photo de l'Ã©vÃªque de Rome seul sur la place Saint-Pierre lors de la pandÃ©mie de Covid-19.
FranÃ§ois a Ã©tÃ© hospitalisÃ© initialement pour une bronchite, mais le Saint-SiÃ¨ge a rÃ©vÃ©lÃ© mardi qu'il avait dÃ©veloppÃ© une pneumonie dans les deux poumons, une infection du tissu pulmonaire potentiellement mortelle. Cette hospitalisation, la quatriÃ¨me depuis 2021, suscite de vives inquiÃ©tudes alors que le pape a dÃ©jÃ  Ã©tÃ© affaibli par une sÃ©rie de problÃ¨mes ces derniÃ¨res annÃ©es, allant d'opÃ©rations du cÃ´lon et de l'abdomen Ã  des difficultÃ©s Ã  marcher.
L'hospitalisation du pape, Ã  la fois chef spirituel des 1,4 milliard de catholiques dans le monde et chef de l'Etat de la CitÃ© du Vatican, a relancÃ© les interrogations autour de sa capacitÃ© Ã  assurer sa charge, alors que le droit canonique ne prÃ©voit aucune disposition en cas de problÃ¨me grave qui altÃ¨rerait sa luciditÃ©.

author: Edward Moss
title: Arsenal 0-2 West Ham United: Hammers march into top six as Gunners fire blank
text:
Arsenal fell to a disappointing 2-0 loss at home to London rivals West Ham United in the Premier League on Thursday night.
Czech midfielder
Tomas Soucek turned home a brilliant Jarrod Bowen cross to put the Hammers ahead after a lengthy VAR check. Dinos Mavropanos, who spent four years at Arsenal, then doubled the visitors lead with a towering header early in the second half. Mikel Arteta made just one change to the side who drew 1-1 with Liverpool on Saturday, with Leandro Trossard coming into midfield for the suspended Kai Havertz.
The German was suspended after picking up a fifth yellow card at
Anfield.
Following the Hammers' impressive 2-0 win at home to
Manchester United at the weekend, David Moyes named an unchanged starting XI. Lucas Paqueta looked a doubt after he hobbled off during the warmup, however the Brazilian midfielder did start the match before being forced off through injury in the 33rd minute.
This was the second time the two sides had played each other this season, as
https://www.vavel.com/en/football/2023/12/26/arsenal/1166963-mikel-arteta-commends-incredible-job-moyes-is-doing-at-west-ham.html knocked the Gunners out of the EFL Cup at the start of November.
The last time
https://www.vavel.com/en/football/2023/12/26/arsenal/1166963-mikel-arteta-commends-incredible-job-moyes-is-doing-at-west-ham.html won at the Emirates Stadium was over eight years ago, when goals from Cheikhou Kouyate and Mauro Zarate handed the Irons a season opening win over Arsenal.
-
Story of the Match
It was the home side who had the first look on goal as
Martin Odegaard flicked the ball into the path of Bukayo Saka, who looked to curl a shot into the far corner, but he could only find the arms of Alphonse Areola.
The Gunners had another decent chance when
Gabriel Martinelli was able to lay the ball back to Trossard from inside the box, however the Belgian fired his shot well over the crossbar.
Despite the early pressure from Arsenal, it was the visitors who took an early lead.
Bowen did well to rescue the ball from the by-line and was able to divert it back into the penalty area, where midfielder Soucek was quickest to react and made no mistake from close range.
There was a lengthy VAR review as the ball looked to have potentially gone out of play, but after a three-and-a-half minute wait, the goal stood.
Arsenal came close to an equaliser just past the half-hour mark, when
Gabriel Jesus played a clever ball into the box, which was headed towards goal by Saka, who forced a fantastic point blank save from Hammers shot stopper Areola.
The Gunners had another great chance just five minutes later when Martinelli got on the end of a stray pass inside the box, however the Brazilian couldn't hit the target with his effort.
With three minutes of the first half left to play, the home side continued to press forward, and thought they had levelled the score when Odegaard threaded Saka into the box with a pin point pass, however the 22-year-old's shot smashed against the near post, with the rebound going out for a
https://www.vavel.com/en/football/2023/12/26/arsenal/1166963-mikel-arteta-commends-incredible-job-moyes-is-doing-at-west-ham.html goal kick.
Declan Rice, who made a Â£105million move to Arsenal from West Ham in the summer, almost brought his side level in spectacular fashion from long range after the break, however his effort skimmed just over the crossbar.
It was West Ham who scored next in the 55th minute though to double their advantage, after former Arsenal defender Mavropanos wrestled free of his marker inside the box, and headed home a
James Ward-Prowse corner - his sixth assist of the season.
Arsenal could have got a goal back 10 minutes later, as Jesus got on the end of a good cross but could only direct the ball straight at the goalkeeper.
Two minutes later the Brazilian striker had another great chance, again getting on the end of a dangerous cross, however this time his header flew off target.
The Gunners continued to search for an avenue back into the match, and carved out a promising looking chance when Odegaard and Trossard linked up inside the box, but once again Areola was equal to the effort.
Just moments later Arsenal came knocking again when Saka tried his luck from distance with a curling effort, however it was an easy save in the end for Areola.
In the last minute of the match, West Ham were awarded a late penalty after Rice clattered into
Emerson in an attempt to get the ball.
Substitute
 SaÃ¯d Benrahma stepped up to take the spot kick, but Arsenal goalkeeper David Raya guessed the right way to keep the score at 2-0.
West Ham now march into the top six of the
Premier League, whereas the Gunners remain in 2nd place, two points behind league leaders Liverpool.
-
Player of the Match: James Ward-Prowse
It was hard to pick out a 'Player of the Match' because every player in claret and blue was fantastic, but one man who stood out above the rest was Ward-Prowse.
The 29-year-old joined West Ham in the summer for a reported Â£30million, and has been one of the Irons' best players ever since.
Going forward Ward-Prowse was the architect of most of West Ham's attacks, with the
East London side playing through the midfielder.
The Englishman is known as a set piece specialist and he lived up to that name once again tonight, providing a pinpoint corner delivery into the box for the Hammers' second goal.
Defensively Ward-Prowse was brilliant alongside fellow summer signing
Edson Alvarez, with the entirety of the West Ham backline putting their bodies on the line to preserve their clean sheet.

author: Anthony Talcott
title: â€˜Extremely angry:â€™ Orange County deputy accused of beating child with a belt
text:
VOLUSIA COUNTY, Fla. â€“ An Orange County deputy was arrested on Wednesday over accusations of child abuse, according to the sheriffâ€™s office.
The sheriffâ€™s office announced in a news release that the deputy â€” identified as Tristan Chattic, 39 â€” was arrested in Volusia County.
In an arrest affidavit, Volusia deputies said that they responded to the Fish Memorial Hospital around 9 p.m. after receiving a call about a â€œdomestic violence issue.â€
Upon arrival, they found a woman and her two children, investigators added.
The woman told investigators that one of the children was using an electronic tablet to work on homework, which upset Chattic and caused him to unplug the device, the affidavit shows.
[EXCLUSIVE: Become a News 6 Insider (itâ€™s FREE) | PINIT! Share your photos ]
However, the child plugged the device back in, which made Chattic â€œextremely angry,â€ detectives said.
â€œ(Chattic) stood on her left side, yelling at her about disobeying him, then he struck her on the left side of her face in a type of backhand slap,â€ the affidavit reads.
He reportedly grabbed her hair and choked her before pushing her to the floor, deputies explained.
Investigators said they were also told that Chattic then pinned her to the ground by stepping on her back, proceeding to remove his belt and strike her with it.
According to the woman, the child was then brought to the hospital to check for possible injuries, deputies said.
Volusia deputies said they briefed the Orange County Sheriffâ€™s Office on the incident before meeting with Chattic at his home.
Chattic explained that the child was grounded and had been â€œdisobedient,â€ prompting him to strike her with the belt, deputies added.
Ultimately, Chattic was taken into custody, and he faces a charge of aggravated child abuse.
[BODY CAMERA FOOTAGE OF CHATTICâ€™S ARREST CAN BE VIEWED IN THE MEDIA PLAYER BELOW]
Chattic was originally hired in February 2015, though he has been relieved of all law enforcement duties without pay while the investigation continues, OCSOâ€™s news release states.
â€œThese are extremely serious criminal allegations. At the Orange County Sheriffâ€™s Office, we hold our deputies to the highest ethical standards whether they are on duty or off duty,â€ Orange County Sheriff John Mina said in a statement. â€œI have a zero-tolerance policy toward child abuse â€” or any form of domestic violence. These allegations will be thoroughly investigated, and the results of that investigation will be made public.â€
Deputies announced that after the criminal proceedings are completed, an administrative investigation will be conducted by the sheriffâ€™s office.
No additional information has been provided at this time.

author: Jessica Greenan
title: Algal bloom issue hits Curdies River in Peterborough again
text:
Many hundreds of fish are dead as another algal bloom chokes the troubled Curdies River in Peterborough.
The Corangamite Catchment Management Authority confirmed the fish death event happened in the estuary and upstream area in mid-March.
A member of the public reported the incident to the Environmental Protection Authority.
While the exact number of dead fish couldn't be counted due to a large number of birds feeding on them, following the report, local anglers also saw many hundreds of dead fish further upstream.
A water quality assessment by Wannon Water initially indicated low dissolved oxygen and a dinoflagellate - a type of algae that can produce toxins - bloom was the likely cause.
The Great Ocean Road Coast and Parks Authority has installed signs warning people to avoid contact with the water.
More recent monitoring from mid-April showed a different algae class known as Raphidophytes had bloomed. Several species of it can cause toxic blooms, but it's not known whether the one present is toxic.
Troubled waters
The Curdies River and its tributaries have a long history of fish kills and algal blooms due to high nutrient inputs from the catchment.
The estuary has a wide, shallow embayment that limits flushing, and has been prone to experiencing blue-green algae blooms.
This year's blooms were not caused by blue-green algae.
However, the past summer has been the fourth warmest on record in Victoria since 1910. Above average temperatures coupled with below average rainfall have made conditions challenging for aquatic life.
In fact, freshwater flow in the Curdies River in March was the lowest recorded all summer.
